title: Generate Monthly Owner Statement
description: A property manager must prepare and send a monthly financial statement to the property owner.

tasks.description: Reconcile all income (rent, fees) and expenses (repairs, management fees) for the property for the previous month.
tasks.expected_outcome: All financial transactions for the period are categorized and verified.

tasks.description: Generate the owner statement report, which itemizes all income and expenses and shows the net income.
tasks.expected_outcome: A clear and accurate financial report is generated.

tasks.description: Send the statement to the property owner along with the net income payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: The owner receives their report and funds.
